Detailed Description

template<typename EvalT, typename Traits>
class PHAL::SeparableScatterScalarResponse< EvalT, Traits >

Handles scattering of separable scalar response functions into epetra data structures.

A separable response function is one that is a sum of respones across cells. In this case we can compute the Jacobian in a generic fashion.
